about_the_game:
In the demo, you can try up to the second episode of story mode.

Note: Challenge Mode is NOT included in the demo.
detailed_description:
In the demo, you can try up to the second episode of story mode.

Note: Challenge Mode is NOT included in the demo.
name: アリスとガトリング Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In the demo, you can try up to the second episode of story mode. Note: Challenge Mode is NOT included in the demo.
